Description: Carbon Transition ASA is a Norway-based investment company. The Company has a strategy to invest in companies and technologies which contribute to significant reductions of carbon emissions. The Company operates two segments: Axxis Geo Solutions and Investments. The Group (Carbon) has a legacy seismic business operating under the name Axxis, with both an ocean-bottom seismic contract business and a multiclient data library. The purpose of the Investments segment s to invest in companies and technologies which contribute to significant reductions of carbon emissions.

Author: Jonas Solgård
